# eslint/no-void <Badge type="info" text="Restriction" />

<div class="rule-meta">
<Alert class="fix" type="info">
<span class="emoji">ðŸš§</span> An auto-fix is still under development.
</Alert>
</div>

### What it does

Disallow `void` operators.

### Example

```javascript
// error
void 0;
var foo = void 0;

// success
("var foo = bar()");
("foo.void()");
("foo.void = bar");
```

- [Rule Source](https://github.com/oxc-project/oxc/blob/a6b0100501fda75ec313146a992a9f5fce995518/crates/oxc_linter/src/rules/eslint/no_void.rs)
